DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the study is to establish the feasibility/willingness of breast cancer patients to delay surgery to do an exercise program, or be randomized to an exercise training program following treatment, and to see if that willingness correlates with prior physical activity history.
DOC.brief_title: Study on Breast Cancer Patient Perspectives of Exercise
DOC.criteria: women, breast cancer diagnosis, all races will be included. men, those with no breast cancer (ductal carcinoma in situ), pregnant women, children
